ygData.msgSnippet: (Nemesis Enforcer is not at the battle, and Code, be more specific when you open fire, and say if you re using two weapons or not please) The

(Nemesis Enforcer is not at the battle, and Code, be more specific 
when you open fire, and say if you're using two weapons or not please)

The Oblitercons/Oinker/Zergling/Punch:



Pyro raised his weapon at Rodimus Prime, but was knocked back a few 
feet by weapons fire from different Maximals.  Leaking mech-fluid, he 
fired off two fireballs at Deemos' torso.

---

Hiss cursed, a blast catching him in the side.  He stumbled, firing 
off three fusion blasts at Inzola's sternum.

---

Breakdown yelled as a shot pierced his thigh.  He fired off a grenade 
at Inzola, set to explode on impact.

---

Oinker cursed.  "Slaggin' Maxis think they're betta then muh." he 
said, as shots hit him, firing off three laser bolts at Airbomber's 
abdomen.

---

Punch fired off a rocket at the <EM>Ark</EM>.

---
  
Zergling cursed, shots knocking him back.  He fired off a dozen 
blasts at Airbomber from his rapid-firing weapon, charging.
